analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: GMS score 39 marks a shift into a Defensive regime as downward momentum pushed the index below the neutral threshold. Rising VIX (Fear) and DXY (Dollar strength) reflect tightening liquidity. While weak retail sales fuel recession fears, stable credit spreads offer a minor buffer. Caution is advised as support levels are tested; focus on capital preservation until momentum stabilizes and market direction becomes clearer.

reports.EN: GMS score 39 marks a shift into a Defensive regime as downward momentum pushed the index below the neutral threshold. Rising VIX (Fear) and DXY (Dollar strength) reflect tightening liquidity. While weak retail sales fuel recession fears, stable credit spreads offer a minor buffer. Caution is advised as support levels are tested; focus on capital preservation until momentum stabilizes and market direction becomes clearer.
reports.ES: El puntaje GMS de 39 indica un cambio hacia un rÃ©gimen Defensivo, ya que el impulso descendente empujÃ³ al Ã­ndice por debajo del umbral neutral. El aumento del VIX (Miedo) y el DXY (Fuerza del dÃ³lar) reflejan una liquidez mÃ¡s ajustada. Aunque las dÃ©biles ventas minoristas alimentan los temores de recesiÃ³n, los diferenciales de crÃ©dito estables ofrecen un respiro. Se recomienda precauciÃ³n mientras se prueban los soportes; enfoque en la preservaciÃ³n.

reports.ID: Skor GMS 39 menandai transisi ke rezim Defensif karena momentum penurunan mendorong indeks di bawah ambang batas netral. Kenaikan VIX (Ketakutan) dan DXY (Kekuatan Dolar) mencerminkan likuiditas yang mengetat. Meskipun penjualan ritel yang lemah memicu kekhawatiran resesi, spread kredit yang stabil memberikan sedikit perlindungan. Disarankan tetap berhati-hati saat level support diuji; fokus pada pelestarian modal hingga momentum stabil.

reports.DE: Ein GMS-Score von 39 markiert den Ãœbergang in ein defensives Regime, da das AbwÃ¤rtsmomentum den Index unter die neutrale Schwelle drÃ¼ckte. Ein steigender VIX (Angst) und DXY (DollarestÃ¤rke) spiegeln die Verknappung der LiquiditÃ¤t wider. WÃ¤hrend schwache EinzelhandelsumsÃ¤tze Rezessionssorgen schÃ¼ren, bieten stabile Kredit-Spreads einen Puffer. Vorsicht ist geboten, da wichtige UnterstÃ¼tzungsebenen getestet werden; PrioritÃ¤t liegt auf dem Kapitalerhalt.
reports.FR: Le score GMS de 39 marque un passage en rÃ©gime DÃ©fensif, l'Ã©lan baissier ayant poussÃ© l'indice sous le seuil neutre. La hausse du VIX (Peur) et du DXY (Force du dollar) reflÃ¨te un resserrement de la liquiditÃ©. Bien que les ventes au dÃ©tail dÃ©cevantes alimentent les craintes de rÃ©cession, la stabilitÃ© des spreads de crÃ©dit offre un lÃ©ger tampon. La prudence est de mise tant que les supports sont testÃ©s ; privilÃ©giez la prÃ©servation du capital.

news.title: Disappointing holiday season: December retail sales were flat, falling well short of estimate
The AI threat wrecked software stocks. Now broker stocks look next with LPL down 11%
Alphabet boosts debt sale again as total raise exceeds $30 billion, sources say
Trump Commerce Sec. Lutnick admits visiting Epstein island during family vacation
GOP anxiety over Trump tariffs tests House Speaker Johnson in upcoming vote
S&P 500 ticks lower after disappointing retail sales data; financial stocks drop: Live updates

ID: Musim liburan yang mengecewakan: penjualan ritel Desember stagnan, jauh di bawah perkiraan
